citations.narrative:
Multiple feeders on the bottom row of cages had moisture buildup on the interior, which appeared to be urine, and was
causing caking of dust and feed on the sides of the hopper. Contamination of feed with urine may lead to the growth of
mold and/or bacteria and adversely impact animal welfare. The facility must ensure that feeders are kept clean.
Corrected during the inspection on October 31, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.54(b) 
   
Feeding. 
Multiple feeders on the bottom row of cages had moisture buildup on the interior, which appeared to be urine, and was 
causing caking of dust and feed on the sides of the hopper. Contamination of feed with urine may lead to the growth of 
mold and/or bacteria and adversely impact animal welfare. The facility must ensure that feeders are kept clean.  
 
Corrected during the inspection on October 31, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
